description.ko: 금속, 물, 그리고 활기찬 네온 조명 사이의 낭만적인 상호작용에 초점을 맞춘 비 내리는 고밀도 사이버펑크 거리 풍경.
description.en: A rainy, high-density cyberpunk street scene focusing on the romantic interplay between metal, water, and vibrant neon light.

prompt: A low-angle cinematic view of a rain-drenched #1A0033 cyberpunk alleyway, saturated with #FF00FF and #00FFFF neon reflections in hyper-realistic asphalt puddles. A massive holographic shrine glows with #FF6B35 light, reflecting off rusted metal catwalks and wet carbon fiber textures. 8k, Unreal Engine 5, raytracing. Deep volumetric fog and realistic light spill from high-density urban structures capture the digital romance of a futuristic city, with a sharp focus on individual rain droplets hitting metallic surfaces.
